title: Solar tower developer bags ‘company-changing’ $110m investment from Japanese fund
text:
End date Solar tower developer bags ‘company-changing’ $110m investment from Japanese fund 
Australian firm EnviroMission has agreed a $110 million deal with a Japanese fund for a solar tower project in the US. To access this article please sign-in below or register for a free one-month trial. Login
